meanings.definition: To act as a deejay at a party or event.
meanings.sent1: She deejayed at the school dance last night.
meanings.sent2: He deejayed the music for the wedding reception.
meanings.sent3: The cat deejayed a playlist of meows at the animal party.
meanings.sent4: The sun deejayed the colors of the sky at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The DJ deejayed a symphony of beats that made everyone dance.

meanings.sent1: After the event, they talked about the deejayed music.
meanings.sent2: The deejayed tracks brought back memories of the party.
meanings.sent3: The deejayed tunes played in his dreams all night.
meanings.sent4: The deejayed melodies echoed through the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The deejayed mixtape was a hit among the guests.
